verses.verse: And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7925>rose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> and they <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H7851>Shittim,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> he and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H3885>lodged<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> they <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over.<s%>
And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass <S%H7097>after<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that the <S%H7860>officers<s%> <S%H5674>went<s%> <S%H7130>through<s%> the <S%H4264>host;<s%>

And they <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> When you <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> it, then you shall <S%H5265>remove<s%> from your <S%H4725>place,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> it.

<S%H389>Yet<s%> there shall be a <S%H7350>space<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> you and it, about two <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> by <S%H4060>measure:<s%> <S%H7126>come<s%> not <S%H7126>near<s%> to it, that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> by <S%H834>which<s%> you must <S%H3212>go:<s%> for you have not <S%H5674>passed<s%> this <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H8543>heretofore.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H6942>Sanctify<s%> yourselves: for <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6381>wonders<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> you.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5375>Take<s%> up the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%> And they <S%H5375>took<s%> up the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> will I <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H1431>magnify<s%> you in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they may <S%H3045>know<s%> that, as I was with <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> so I will be with you.

And you shall <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> When you are <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H7097>brink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> you shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> still in <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5066>Come<s%> <S%H5066>here,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2063>Hereby<s%> you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> is <S%H7130>among<s%> you, and that he will without fail <S%H3423>drive<s%> out from <S%H6440>before<s%> you the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittites,<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzites,<s%> and the <S%H1622>Girgashites,<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorites,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusites.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H113>LORD<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H5674>passes<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you into <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

<S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore <S%H3947>take<s%> you <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H376>men<s%> out of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> out of every <S%H7626>tribe<s%> a <S%H376>man.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, as soon as the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H113>LORD<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> shall <S%H5117>rest<s%> in the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> that the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from the <S%H4325>waters<s%> that <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H4605>above;<s%> and they shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> on an <S%H5067>heap.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H5674>pass,<s%> when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5265>removed<s%> from their <S%H168>tents,<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people;<s%>

And as they that <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> were <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> were <S%H2881>dipped<s%> in the <S%H7097>brim<s%> of the <S%H4325>water,<s%> (for <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> <S%H4390>overflows<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1415>banks<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest,<s%>)

That the <S%H4325>waters<s%> which <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H4605>above<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> and <S%H6965>rose<s%> up on an <S%H5067>heap<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H121>Adam,<s%> that is <S%H6654>beside<s%> <S%H6891>Zaretan:<s%> and those that <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H5921>toward<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6160>plain,<s%> even the <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> <S%H8552>failed,<s%> and were <S%H3772>cut<s%> off: and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> right <S%H5048>against<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H3559>firm<s%> on <S%H2724>dry<s%> ground in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3478>Israelites<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> on <S%H2724>dry<s%> ground, <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>people<s%> were <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H8552>clean<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>
